Author: VirideGliridae
Text: Also that might be the only place he feels comfortable venting - don't take that away from him. It sucks feeling like you have lost your place to talk freely about things no matter how fucked up it might sound.

Author: PM_ME_YER_SHIBA_INUS
Text: > i was thinking about screenshotting some of his tweets and send them anonymously to her mom???  His? Don't do this. You have no idea what kind of person she is. For all you know, there could be a backlash for him if she finds out.  I'd just go try and be his friend. See if he wants/needs anything.
